price: 38. Too taturru itteemik umaamay edde yabba inney sin как waasne inkih ku Rabbih xaqul is umaamay usuk niqbaah isi naqoosah faxe waa kinni.
arabic: كُلُّ ذَٰلِكَ كَانَ سَيِّئُهُۥ عِندَ رَبِّكَ مَكۡرُوهٗا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: kullu dhālika kāna sayyi-uhu ʿinda rabbika makrūhan
